scripts.c: g++ main.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.test: g++ -Xpreprocessor -fopenmp -L/opt/homebrew/opt/libomp/lib -lomp tests.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.testOmp: g++ -Xpreprocessor -fopenmp -L/opt/homebrew/opt/libomp/lib -lomp tests.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -O3 -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
